Articles.Content:
I play Kerbin Colonizing Program more than Kerbal Space Program, so I spend a lot of time on Kerbin.

I like the blue ozone but, but the yellowish sunrises and sunsets seem to look rather dull :/

Is moding a different color sunrise possible?

Edited September 22, 2014 by Jetenginestar

Sunsets, you don't have to get up early

Oh you meant modding?

Sorry

Use graphics enhancement mods
supposedly being worked on for a future release of Environmental Visual Enhancements mod
